Sandy_Birthday_Greeting: Oh, Nayami! I was hoping you'd show up!$h#$b#I was actually feeling a little lonely this morning.#$e#But I'm glad you're here!$h
Sandy_Birthday_Hangout: How's that Stardew Valley weather right now?#$e#The flowers there smell lovely.$h
Sandy_Birthday_Lake: It always seems to stay a little cooler by the lake.#$e#It's good to get out of the house now and then!$h
Sandy_Birthday_Camel: I think she sells some rare products.
Sandy_Birthday_Bye: I had a great time.$h#$b#Thanks for being my friend.$h#$e#Come back again any time!$h
